discussion.author: fredrikekre
discussion.text: You can just retrigger the bot and this PR will be updated.

discussion.author: fredrikekre
discussion.text: Consider enabling TagBot to make sure the release is persistent in your repo, see https://discourse.julialang.org/t/ann-tagbot-creates-tags-and-releases-for-your-julia-packages-when-theyre-registered/23084
